title: Report: These are the airports with the fastest free Wi-Fi in the world, US tops the list
content:
Ookla just published its list of airports with the fastest free Wi-Fi in the world during Q1 2022. The analysis focuses on Wi-Fi over mobile connections on free Wi-Fi provided by the individual airports and Wi-Fi at selected airport lounges. Four US airports top the list.

moreâ€¦

The post Report: These are the airports with the fastest free Wi-Fi in the world, US tops the list appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Ookla just published its list of airports with the fastest free Wi-Fi in the world during Q1 2022. Some US airports tops the list.
